Question: jingan Marvoto Technology Co.,LTD CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Marvoto Technology Co., Ltd.

Fetus camera M1

- Industry's first wireless smart handheld 3D ultrasound
- Awarded G-MARK Award, CES Innovation Award, and Geneva Invention Gold Award
- Completed KICKSTARTER crowdfunding of USD 4,300.00 and obtained orders from 30 countries

Muscle & Fat Z2

- World's first weight loss artifact with black technology
- Measures fat & muscle thickness in different parts quickly
- Launched online sales on Amazon and Shopify, and reached OEM cooperation with top listed companies

Ongoing Developments

- Handheld cardiac ultrasound, 3D vascular ultrasound navigation system, and in vitro ovulation instrument under development
- Cooperation intentions from multiple leading companies
Summary_cn:
瑪沃特科技有限公司

胎兒攝影機M1

- 行業首款無線智能手持式3D超聲波
- 獲得G-MARK獎、CES創新獎和日內疆發明金獎
- 完成了4300美元的KICKSTARTER群眾募資，並獲得了來自30個國家的訂單

肌肉和脂肪Z2

- 全球首款具備黑科技的減肥神器
- 快速測量不同部位的脂肪和肌肉厚度
- 在亞馬遜和Shopify上推出了在線銷售，並與頂級上市公司展開了OEM合作

正在進行的開發項目

- 手持式心臟超聲波、3D血管超聲導航系統和體外排卵儀的開發
- 多家領先企業表示合作意向
